comments:
When there are ereferences from one epackage to another then both (or all) epackages need to be registered in the same datastore. Otherwise the following (technical) npe is thrown. Improve the error reporting.

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.emf.teneo.annotations.mapper.DefaultAnnotator.processClass(DefaultAnnotator.java:224)
